name: [LD51 - Every 10 Seconds] Dust and Death
description:
The intense heat of the merciless post-apocalyptic desert is turning people into zombies! Drive forward and don’t look back, lest you turn into one yourself.

Hit water barrels along the way to cool down! You will only last about 10 seconds without cooling down.

Zombies piling on top of the car increase the speed at which you overheat. Run into walls or water barrels to throw them off.

Controls:

  • WSAD - movement
  • Enter - start/restart/continue

Known Bugs:

  • Reverse steering is, well, reversed - ran out of time and couldn’t fix it
